abstract: Nuance Communications, which has attracted Carl Icahn’s interest, has no shortage of well-defined operations like medical, enterprise and consumer that could be sold or spun off., the author writes.
snippet: Nuance Communications, which has attracted Carl Icahn’s interest, has no shortage of well-defined operations like medical, enterprise and consumer that could be sold or spun off., the author writes.
lead_paragraph: Over the last decade, Nuance Communications has been on a frenetic shopping spree.

headline.main: A Tech M.&A. Machine Hits the Brakes
